summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackClarins Super Restorative Night Moisturizer is an anti-aging night cream for mature skin visibly minimizes lines, wrinkles and slackening. Powered by Organic Harungana, as effective as retinol* and gentle on the skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsVisibly minimizes lines, wrinkles, loss of density + skin slackeningVisibly lifts, firms, smoothes + plumpsHydrates, comforts + softensHelps even skin toneKey IngredientsOrganic Harungana Extract: as effective as retinol* and gentle on the skin to visibly minimize wrinkles and loss of densityOrganic Desert Date Extract + a Vitamin C Derivative: promote an even skin toneOrganic Sea Lily Extract: intensely hydrates to leave skin feeling soft and comfortableOrganic Service Tree Bud Extract: enhances microcirculation while you sleep to boost skin's radiancePlant-based Anti-Pollution Complex: helps protect skin from indoor and outdoor pollution, including blue light from electronicsOrganic Gorse Extract: takes on skin slackening at the sourceResearch Results88% visibly smoother skin*81% replenished skin**80% visibly tighter, “lifted” skin***Consumer test - Super Restorative Night Cream, All Skin Types, 111 women – 7 days.**Consumer test - Super Restorative Night Cream, All Skin Types, 111 women – 28 days.Item 2598904How To UseCLARINS EXCLUSIVE DRAINING PRESSURE APPLICATION METHODSmooth over clean face and neck each night.Apply with gentle press-and-release movements, avoiding the eye contour area.Work downward, over neck and décolleté.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Cetearyl Isononanoate, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Propanediol, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides, Dimethicone, Glyceryl Stearate, Peg-100 Stearate, Cetearyl Glucoside, Butylene Glycol, Carbomer, Glyceryl Caprylate, Sodium Hydroxide, Parfum/Fragrance, Xylitylglucoside, Hydroxyacetophenone, Sodium Citrate, Anhydroxylitol, Xanthan Gum, Tocopheryl Acetate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Xylitol, Disodium Edta, Alcohol, Sodium Lactate, Glucose, Citric Acid, Harungana Madagascariensis Extract, Marrubium Vulgare Extract, Coco-Glucoside, Balanites Roxburghii Seed Oil, Phenethyl Alcohol, Furcellaria Lumbricalis Extract, Pancratium Maritimum Extract, Pyrus Sorbus Bud Extract, Ulex Europaeus Leaf/Root/Stem Extract, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Lapsana Communis Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Maris Sal/Sea Salt/Sel Marin, Ci 14700/Red 4, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7 [V3994A].Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: CLARINS EXCLUSIVE DRAINING PRESSURE APPLICATION METHODSmooth over clean face and neck each night.Apply with gentle press-and-release movements, avoiding the eye contour area.Work downward, over neck and décolleté.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again.
reviews.comments: I like the texture and see an improvement in the texture and brightness of my skin.

reviews.headline: First time using this product, I have used your serums and t
reviews.comments: I would definitely buy this product again makes me feel moist plumped and it smoothens out all of my fine lines so very happy….

reviews.headline: I purchased this for my mom.
reviews.comments: She is in love with it. I will be getting it again for Christmas.

reviews.headline: Very rich and hydrating
reviews.comments: Although this is expensive , it's worth the investment

reviews.headline: Best Nightcream I've tried!
reviews.comments: After trying several brands over the years, I decided add this product to my Clarins routine and I truly see a difference in my skin since using this for over 6 months now...very hydrating and smells good, noticeably reduced the lines by my jowls and lip area, and because you only need a dime size for your face, it lasts a long time.

reviews.headline: Pilling
reviews.comments: This pills terribly. It is so bad i will return it. Too bad, I was looking forward to using it.

reviews.headline: Unfortunately I'm obsessed
reviews.comments: Unfortunately im obsessed woth this product. Unfortunately for me and my wallet due to the price but it works fabulously. I've repurchased this product four times already. It smells great, feels amazing and leaves the skins supple and glowing.

reviews.headline: Like Magic!
reviews.comments: I received a sample-size of Clarins Super Restorative Night Moisture as a free gift from Ulta, and 1) love a free gift 2) love a free gift that introduces me to a product that works well on my skin. I was looking for a night-time moisturizer to add to my skincare routine, and just with this sample-size, I saw results in just 4 days. It leaves my skin feeling moisturized and plump in the morning without feeling oily. The scent is nice and subtle, and it actually is very similar to Fenty's Hydra Vizor Moisturizer scent, but just a little less potent in scent (which I prefer) and more lightweight. The moisturizer is smooth to touch on my hands and when applying to my skin. With this, I'd say a little goes a long way, which is great because it's definitely on the pricier side. I'm 32 and I highly recommend this product if you want to be preventive and/or just looking for a night-time moisturizer to add to your skincare.

reviews.headline: The pilling is so bad
reviews.comments: I put this on and it felt like my skin was peeling off by pounds. But it was just this product pilling off. I only used small amount and have no idea how that amount even pilled.

reviews.headline: Love this!!
reviews.comments: I have dry skin and have tried so many night time  moisturizers from drugstore to very high end and this is my favorite. In just one week my skin is softer and not as dry. Will continue to buy this.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I've been using Clarins for more than 40 years!
I'm almost 80.. either lucky, the Clarins, or genes!
Maybe all three!
faceoff_positive.headline: Love my Clarins

faceoff_negative.comments: I am a loyal Clarins customer and used their products for a very long time. This specific night cream is just disappointing, the product texture is good n light but the fragrance is overwhelming and overly scented. I am so reluctant to use it at night as I also have to take care of my baby and scared it is too much scent for him. Common Clarins you can do better and start using actual customer and not celebrity to test your product.
faceoff_negative.headline: The fragrance is way too strong!
